scripts.sync: git pull && npm install && forever restart "$PWD/bin/www"
scripts.build_dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist dist/embed dist/widget dist/about dist/contacts dist/dashboard dist/help dist/faq dist/insurance dist/partners dist/partners/corporations dist/partners/webmasters dist/partners/sellers dist/success dist/antirating && cp public/favicon.ico dist/ && cp -r public/img dist/ && cp -r public/fonts dist/ && cp sendmail.php dist/
scripts.build_jade: jade -p views/page.jade < views/index.jade > dist/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/widget.jade > dist/widget/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/about.jade > dist/about/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/contacts.jade > dist/contacts/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/dashboard.jade > dist/dashboard/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/help.jade > dist/help/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/faq.jade > dist/faq/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/insurance.jade > dist/insurance/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/partners.jade > dist/partners/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/partners-corporations.jade > dist/partners/corporations/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/partners-webmasters.jade > dist/partners/webmasters/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/partners-sellers.jade > dist/partners/sellers/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/success.jade > dist/success/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/antirating.jade > dist/antirating/index.html && jade -p views/page.jade < views/embed.jade > dist/embed/index.html
scripts.build_js_css: lessc public/stylesheets/styles.less dist/index.css && browserify scripts/index.js > dist/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build_dist && npm run build_jade && npm run build_js_css
